body_html:
Hi @sleighsoft
my program flow is:
tensorflow calculations >> post-processing cuda code
It won't calculate at same time.
I just wonder if tensorflow force every code in same project or scope share same resource from GPU.
I have 2 GeForce GTX 1080, I have tested that make tensorflow only see the first one.
But it make my C++ cuda code only see the same one in the available GPU device list....

Any idea to workaround? Thanks.....

body:
Hi @sleighsoft
my program flow is:
tensorflow calculations >> post-processing cuda code 
It won't calculate at same time.
I just wonder if tensorflow force every code in same project or scope share same resource from GPU.
I have 2 GeForce GTX 1080, I have tested that make tensorflow only see the first one.
But it make my C++ cuda code only see the same one in the available GPU device list....

Any idea to workaround? Thanks.....
